page.title: 11Hobbies
page.content: We asked the children in our school about their favourite hobbies. The most popular was horse riding. 13 people like riding horses. The nearest pony club is at North Molton. The next biggest number we had was 12 for football. Most people play football at the recreation ground by the Barnstaple Road, in South Molton. 11 people like riding their bikes. There is no BMX track around here and no other bike club you can go to. 9 people liked swimming. Most people go swimming in the Summer seasons at the South Molton pool when lots of holiday makers come to South Molton. They usually go swimming nearly every day. On Monday nights in the Summer season there is a swimming club. In Winter there is a Winter training club in Barnstaple pool. 7 people liked reading. The nearest
